title: Jio native video calling on pixel 2 xl
content:
Jio native video calling from carrier without any third party application 
(Native Video calling support is a facility provided by the network in support with the device without using any third party OTT applications like skype, facetime, hangouts, what's app, Google duo etc. to make video calls except using the native inbuilt smartphone functionality without a need to switch on the data connection)
